Third Culture Group Structure

Our Group Business is split into three divisions

OUR STORY

We are a Finnish company on a mission to create the world’s leading alliance of brands anddistributors operating a common sales/distribution platform and route-to-market for mindful consumption.

Our journey started in 2007 as VEEN Waters and Third Culture Group (formerly VEEN Waters Finland Oy) got its avatar in July of 2020.

We believe that mindful consumers are looking for honest and transparent brands that are focused onwell-being, produced with high-quality ingredients, are earth-friendly alternatives and enjoyable to consume. We believe a mindful lifestyle is the future of consumption.

OUR COMPANY STRUCTURE


1. PRODUCTION

We own and operate two spring water and natural mineral water bottling plants in Finnish Lapland and the Himalayan Kingdom of Bhutan.

OUR STORY

2. BRAND BUILDING

We own the brands VEEN, Ayurveda Super Shots, Ayurveda Water, Nordic Mixers, Ayur Atmospherics*, VEEN Plant-Based*, Ayurveda Gummi*

*to be launched in 2021.

OUR STORY

3. ROUTE TO MARKET

Zero Percent is our route to market brand developed to retail and distribute our own brands,allicance partner brands and exclusively distributed brands through our multi-channel D2C retail, HORECA and retail distribution approach.

The platform represents leading brands in the 0% categoreis of 0% alchol,0% dairy, 0% pesticides, 0% sugar, 0% microplastic,0% gluten, fine waters and 0% meat.

*to be launched in 2021.

OUR STORY

The platform represents leading brands in the 0% categoreis of 0% alchol,0% dairy, 0% pesticides, 0% sugar, 0% microplastic,0% gluten, fine waters and 0% meat.

*to be launched in 2021.

OUR STORY

At TCG, we own, produce, represent, market, distribute and sell leadingbrands in the categories of 0% alcohol, 0% dairy, 0% pesticides, 0% sugar, 0% microplastic, 0% gluten, fine water and 0% meat.

OUR STORY

There are more than one definition of Mindful Lifestyle. We call it, the 0% Lifestyle. A type of lifestyle that is good for the body, good for the community, and good for the environment.

Read more about TCG team
